abstract: Building off an aggressive early sprint for cash, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas outmatched the rest of the Republican field during the fund-raising quarter that ended on Sept. 30.
snippet: Building off an aggressive early sprint for cash, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas outmatched the rest of the Republican field during the fund-raising quarter that ended on Sept. 30.
lead_paragraph: Building off an aggressive early sprint for cash, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas outmatched the rest of the Republican field during the fund-raising quarter that ended Sept. 30, attracting thousands of donors in Texas and beyond who gave the maximum $2,500 contribution for the primary campaign, according to documents filed with the Federal Election Commission on Saturday.

headline.main: Perry Outraises Republican Field in Short Quarter
